text: Adding the author name of the post here would be extremely beneficial. Right now, the "3 col" limit on what info can show makes it hard to see all the right info you need.

For blog tags, can we get a supplemental field added for a tag description? This way on the tag pages themselves like `/tag/sample-tag` we can have a better meta description for that page. Right now, unless you've custom coded something for them, they just show text from the first post on that page
